title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Mobile-Based Intelligent Information Retrieval Learning: Enhancing Language Proficiency

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can search for reliable information sources in the target language with 80% accuracy using mobile devices
Learners can explain the process of resolving language-related issues (e.g., grammar interpretation, vocabulary expansion) using intelligent search tools
Learners can complete language projects (e.g., cultural comparison reports) based on data collected in mobile learning environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
